description: pot: oval with 3 feet and 2 raised handles; horizontal bands with ribs and circular decorations (knots?) around pot; base: darker bamboo; trefoil shape with 3 leaves on top; 3 raised edges between leaves to hold pot; 3 feet; lid: darker bamboo; oval with 2 semi-circular notches for handles; attached jade carving on top of 4 deer(?)
marks: 4 Chinese characters on bottom of pot
title: Pot with Lid and Base
